issue.title: [JS] Upgrade to TS 3.1
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3689](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3689). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Attempted [here](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2611#issuecomment-431318129), but ran into issues.

Should upgrade typedoc to 0.13 at the same time.
